scripts.clean: concurrently 'cd JMT-Frontend && rm -rf node_modules && npm i' 'cd JMT-Backend && rm -rf node_modules && npm i'
scripts.start: concurrently 'cd JMT-Frontend && npm start' 'cd JMT-Backend && npm start'
scripts.dev: concurrently 'cd JMT-Frontend && npm start' 'cd JMT-Backend && npm run start:dev'
